Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: This stretch of cobblestone is known as Salt Street. The street is well lit by bright sunlight. The street is enfolded in the cloak of night. Morning has broken and the first rays of sunshine can be seen shimmering down. The sun has risen and the hustle and bustle of the city is audible. The midday sun is high in the sky and waves of heat can be seen shimmering off the cobblestones. The bright blue skies of the afternoon bathe every corner of the street in sunlight. The sun has set and the street is shadowed in the failing light. Evening has fallen and the street is dimmed. There is a slight chill in the air. Midnight has enveloped the silent street. A slight lightening of the sky bathes the street in an eerie light as dawn approaches. Southwest leads to Sea Street and northeast leads to a courtyard. A patch of the street's cobblestones has been recently swept clean.
This is known as Salt Street.

A patch of cobblestones seems somewhat cleaner than the rest of those comprising this street.
